faqs.question: How do I start learning?
faqs.answer: Just pick any course from the homepage and start reading. Every topic is structured in a step-by-step format.

faqs.question: Are the mock interviews free?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can try a limited number of mock interviews for free. Premium options provide expert feedback.

faqs.question: Is this platform beginner-friendly?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All content is written to be understood easily, even if you're just starting.
